analysis.description:
Referral.invest (/unique_chucks/2/0xebb060f9d0029082a04f78d84b9fb9d3d26f9a93.sol#649-681) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-wbtToken.mint(_client,active / 100 * wbtToken.rate() / wbtToken.mrate()) (/unique_chucks/2/0xebb060f9d0029082a04f78d84b9fb9d3d26f9a93.sol#673)
	-wbtToken.mint(_client,amount * wbtToken.rate() / wbtToken.mrate()) (/unique_chucks/2/0xebb060f9d0029082a04f78d84b9fb9d3d26f9a93.sol#680-681)

Referral.investBct (/unique_chucks/2/0xebb060f9d0029082a04f78d84b9fb9d3d26f9a93.sol#685-697) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-bctToken.transfer(_client,amount * ethUsdRate / bctToken.price()) (/unique_chucks/2/0xebb060f9d0029082a04f78d84b9fb9d3d26f9a93.sol#695-697)

Referral.transferBctToken (/unique_chucks/2/0xebb060f9d0029082a04f78d84b9fb9d3d26f9a93.sol#892-903) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-bctToken.transfer(_addr,_amount) (/unique_chucks/2/0xebb060f9d0029082a04f78d84b9fb9d3d26f9a93.sol#902-903)

Referral.distribute has external calls inside a loop:
	- status = data.statuses(node) (/unique_chucks/2/0xebb060f9d0029082a04f78d84b9fb9d3d26f9a93.sol#719)

Referral.distribute has external calls inside a loop:
	- data.addBalance(node,_amount * percentage * 1000) (/unique_chucks/2/0xebb060f9d0029082a04f78d84b9fb9d3d26f9a93.sol#729-730)

Referral.distribute has external calls inside a loop:
	- data.addReferralDeposit(node,_amount * ethUsdRate / 10 ** 18) (/unique_chucks/2/0xebb060f9d0029082a04f78d84b9fb9d3d26f9a93.sol#733)

Referral.distribute has external calls inside a loop:
	- node = data.parentOf(node) (/unique_chucks/2/0xebb060f9d0029082a04f78d84b9fb9d3d26f9a93.sol#741-742)

Referral.updateStatus has external calls inside a loop:
	- data.setStatus(_node,statusThreshold[thresholds[i]]) (/unique_chucks/2/0xebb060f9d0029082a04f78d84b9fb9d3d26f9a93.sol#775-781)
